title: Trump Administration Set to Pause $510 Million for Brown University
abstract: The administration has now targeted five schools’ federal funding as part of a pledge to combat what it considers to be antisemitism on university campuses.

title: How the Trump Administration Might Target D.E.I. in Public Schools
abstract: A letter from the administration promised to withdraw funding from schools that allow certain D.E.I. programs. But what counts as D.E.I. may prove murky.

title: Trump Just Bet the Farm
abstract: Donald Trump is upending a world that has brought peace and stability for 80 years. What is it he doesn’t understand?

title: Judge Blocks H.H.S. From Terminating $11 Billion in Public Health Grants
